name: Project Y (Final Inferno)
description:
Project Y is a clicker game where the player discovers a sci-fi world and decides to explore. The sci-fi world does not welcome the anomaly character and retaliates because they determined that the playable character is a virus to this world and must destroy the player to keep their world safe.

The player will arrow key on various abilities that do different amounts of damage. The player will fight a various number of enemies and then a boss for that level, before going to the next stage. In between stages the player can choose how to upgrade their abilities/spells. After fighting through multiple stages they fight the final boss, ‘Anggy Dave.’
